::Perndabot::

Perndabot steps back, looking at the two bots. He didn't trust 
Maximals, although he used to be two of them.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He stepped back from Perndabot, when Iron Raptor gave the order to 
stop.
> He didn't agree but he wouldn't disobay.
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He saw that the femm bot was in command. He didn't get the order to 
stan
> down. They were surrendering?! He pulled back, returning his beam 
saber
> to its holster. He waited to see what happaned.
